title: Dropbox - Q3 2024 Financial Report
content:
## Dropbox, Inc. – Q3 2024 Financial Report

**Executive Summary:**

Dropbox, Inc. delivered a solid performance in Q3 2024, demonstrating continued growth and profitability despite a challenging macroeconomic environment. Revenue reached $635 million, representing a year-over-year increase of 8%. Adjusted operating margin remained strong at 32%, reflecting disciplined cost management and the inherent efficiency of our platform. While growth remains a focus, we are prioritizing sustainable profitability and strategic investments in key areas, including AI-powered features and expanding our collaboration tools.

**Revenue & Growth Metrics:**

Total revenue for Q3 2024 was $635 million, up 8% from $588 million in Q3 2023. This growth was primarily driven by increased paying users, which grew to 18.5 million, up from 17.9 million in the prior year. Average Revenue Per User (ARPU) saw a modest increase to $143.24, reflecting success in upselling premium features and plans. Growth in international markets, particularly in Europe and Asia, contributed significantly to overall revenue gains.

**Key Business Highlights:**

During Q3, we focused on enhancing our core product offerings and integrating AI to improve user productivity. We launched enhanced search capabilities powered by AI, improving the efficiency of content discovery. We also made significant strides in our Dropbox Sign product, achieving a 20% increase in paid users year-over-year, highlighting its growing adoption. Further investment in the Dropbox Dash product saw enhanced integrations and improved UI. These developments solidify Dropbox's position as a unified workspace for organizing and managing diverse types of content.

**Market Conditions & Competitive Landscape:**

The cloud storage and collaboration market remains highly competitive, with major players like Google, Microsoft, and Box vying for market share. Macroeconomic headwinds continue to impact business spending, leading to increased price sensitivity among customers. Dropbox differentiates itself through its ease of use, robust security features, and focus on individual and small-team productivity. Our investment in AI and collaboration tools is aimed at further distinguishing our platform and enhancing our competitive advantage.

**Forward-Looking Statements & Guidance:**

Looking ahead to Q4 2024, we anticipate revenue to be in the range of $640 million to $645 million. We are maintaining our full-year 2024 revenue guidance of $2.52 billion to $2.53 billion. We will continue to prioritize disciplined cost management and strategic investments in key growth areas. We are confident that our focus on innovation, customer satisfaction, and operational excellence will enable us to deliver long-term sustainable growth and value for our shareholders.

title: Dropbox Announces Strategic Partnership
content:
**FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE**

**Dropbox Bolsters Enterprise Security with New Integration with CrowdStrike in San Francisco, CA – October 26, 2023**

Dropbox today announced a strategic integration with CrowdStrike (Nasdaq: CRWD), a leader in cloud-delivered protection of endpoints, cloud workloads, identity and data. This partnership delivers enhanced security for Dropbox Enterprise customers by integrating CrowdStrike’s Falcon platform threat intelligence directly into Dropbox’s file collaboration environment. The integration provides real-time threat detection and automated remediation capabilities, helping organizations proactively protect sensitive data stored and shared within Dropbox.

The collaboration addresses the growing need for comprehensive cybersecurity solutions in today’s hybrid work environment. By leveraging CrowdStrike's advanced threat detection capabilities, Dropbox Enterprise users will benefit from enhanced visibility into potential threats, including malware, ransomware, and phishing attempts. The integrated solution will automatically quarantine suspicious files and alert administrators, minimizing the impact of potential security incidents. This proactive approach to security allows organizations to maintain a secure and compliant file-sharing environment without disrupting workflows.

This integration builds upon Dropbox’s existing robust security features, including data encryption, access controls, and activity monitoring. By combining these internal capabilities with CrowdStrike’s external threat intelligence, Dropbox aims to offer its enterprise clients a comprehensive security posture that addresses both internal and external threats.

“At Dropbox, we are committed to providing our customers with the most secure and reliable file collaboration platform possible,” said Drew Houston, CEO of Dropbox. “Integrating with CrowdStrike allows us to extend our security capabilities, providing real-time threat detection and automated remediation that helps our enterprise customers stay ahead of the evolving threat landscape and protect their most valuable assets.”

Dropbox is a leading global collaboration platform that's transforming the way people work together. With more than 700 million registered users across approximately 180 countries, Dropbox helps teams of all sizes unleash their creative energy, solve problems, and scale their business. From simple file sharing to document collaboration and workflow automation, our platform is designed to reduce busywork so users can focus on the work that matters.

Contact:
support@dropbox.com

content:
## Dropbox Professional: Work Smarter, Collaborate Seamlessly.

**Unlock Your Team’s Potential with Enhanced Storage, Sharing, and Security.**

Dropbox Professional is designed for independent professionals and growing teams who need powerful tools to manage their files, collaborate effectively, and protect their valuable work. Stop juggling multiple platforms and embrace a streamlined workflow designed for success.

**Features That Empower Your Productivity:**

*   **Ample Storage:** Get 3 TB (3,000 GB) of secure storage to house all your important files, projects, and assets. No more worrying about running out of space.
*   **Smart Sync:** Access your files from any device without taking up hard drive space. Dropbox Smart Sync intelligently downloads files on demand, keeping your computer running smoothly.
*   **Advanced Sharing Controls:** Share files and folders with precise permissions. Control who can view, edit, or download your content, and set expiration dates for shared links, ensuring data privacy and compliance.
*   **Dropbox Sign:** Securely send, track, and sign legally binding documents directly within Dropbox. Streamline contract workflows and eliminate the hassle of printing, scanning, and faxing.
*   **Watermarking:** Protect your intellectual property by adding custom watermarks to your documents and images. Discourage unauthorized use and maintain control over your brand assets.
*   **Dropbox Rewind:** Accidentally deleted a file or made unwanted changes? Rewind entire folders or your entire Dropbox account to a previous point in time, minimizing data loss and maximizing peace of mind.
*   **Priority Support:** Get faster, more responsive support from our dedicated customer support team, ensuring your issues are resolved quickly and efficiently.

**Ideal For:**

Freelancers, consultants, small business owners, and creative professionals who need a secure and reliable platform for file storage, collaboration, and document management. Perfect for teams that handle sensitive information and require advanced sharing and security features.

**The Dropbox Advantage:**

Unlike basic cloud storage solutions, Dropbox Professional offers a comprehensive suite of tools designed to enhance productivity and protect your valuable work. Our intuitive interface, robust security features, and seamless integration with popular productivity apps make Dropbox Professional the smart choice for professionals who demand the best. We provide a secure and scalable solution that grows with your business, allowing you to focus on what matters most – your success.

title: Attorney Prove System - Product Brochure
content:
## Unlock Global Growth with Stripe Payments

**Reach more customers and maximize revenue with Stripe Payments, the complete platform for online payments processing.**

Stripe Payments offers a seamless, secure, and scalable solution for businesses of all sizes, from startups to enterprises. We empower you to accept payments globally, manage subscriptions, and optimize your revenue streams, all within a single, unified platform.

**Key Features & Capabilities:**

*   **Global Payment Acceptance:** Effortlessly accept major credit and debit cards, popular digital wallets like Apple Pay and Google Pay, and local payment methods such as SEPA Direct Debit, iDEAL, and Alipay. Expand your reach without the complexity of managing multiple payment integrations.
*   **Fraud Prevention Powered by Stripe Radar:** Our machine learning-powered fraud prevention system, Stripe Radar, dynamically adapts to evolving fraud patterns, minimizing fraudulent transactions and protecting your business without blocking legitimate customers. It analyzes thousands of signals per transaction, ensuring a secure payment experience.
*   **Customizable Checkout Experiences:** Design a checkout flow that reflects your brand and maximizes conversions. Use Stripe Elements, pre-built UI components, or completely customize your checkout experience using our APIs for ultimate control.
*   **Subscription Management Made Easy:** Automate recurring billing cycles, manage subscriptions, and handle failed payments with Stripe Billing. Offer flexible pricing plans, trials, and coupons to attract and retain customers. Integrated revenue recognition tools further streamline your financial operations.
*   **Reporting & Analytics:** Gain deep insights into your business performance with comprehensive reporting and analytics dashboards. Track key metrics like revenue, churn, and customer lifetime value to make data-driven decisions and optimize your strategies.

**Ideal for:**

*   E-commerce businesses looking to expand globally and increase conversion rates.
*   SaaS companies seeking a flexible and reliable subscription management solution.
*   Marketplaces needing a secure and scalable platform for managing payouts to vendors.
*   Any business wanting a simple, streamlined payments system.

**The Stripe Advantage:**

Stripe offers a developer-friendly platform with powerful APIs and comprehensive documentation, ensuring a smooth integration process. Our commitment to security and compliance, including PCI DSS Level 1 certification, provides peace of mind. Unlike traditional payment processors, Stripe offers a modern, unified platform that adapts to your evolving needs, empowering you to focus on growing your business. We provide tools like Stripe Connect for managing platforms and payouts, making our features extensible to a wide variety of business models.

## Stripe Treasury: Banking-as-a-Service for Platforms

**Empower Your Platform & Unlock New Revenue Streams**

Stripe Treasury lets you embed financial services directly into your platform, turning your user experience into a comprehensive business solution. Offer your sellers, freelancers, or creators integrated banking and financial management tools without the complexity of building them from scratch.

**Beyond Payments: A Holistic Financial Ecosystem**

*   **Customized Financial Accounts:** Issue branded debit cards (physical and virtual) and offer FDIC-insured checking accounts, seamlessly integrated within your platform's interface. Automate payouts, manage funds, and streamline expenses – all under your brand.
*   **Instant, Automated Payouts:** Eliminate delays and empower your users with immediate access to their earnings. Offer payouts through ACH, wires, or Stripe balance, configurable based on individual user needs and platform settings. Reduce churn by giving users more control over their funds.
*   **Simplified Financial Management:** Enable users to track balances, review transactions, and reconcile payments directly within your platform. Reduce support burdens and foster financial transparency.
*   **Integrated Reporting & Compliance:** Benefit from robust reporting tools for tracking payment flows, user activity, and overall program performance. Leverage Stripe's compliance expertise to navigate regulatory complexities.

**Ideal for Marketplaces, SaaS Platforms, and Creator Economies**

Stripe Treasury is designed for platforms looking to:

*   Enhance user retention and attract new customers.
*   Increase revenue by offering premium financial services.
*   Simplify payouts and improve cash flow for their users.
*   Reduce operational overhead associated with managing financial relationships.

**The Stripe Advantage: A Unified Financial Infrastructure**

Unlike fragmented solutions, Stripe Treasury offers a fully integrated platform with powerful APIs, developer-friendly documentation, and world-class support. This reduces integration time, minimizes development effort, and provides a secure, scalable foundation for your financial services. Leverage Stripe's robust fraud prevention, KYC/AML capabilities, and global payment network for a seamless, compliant, and reliable experience. Offer a comprehensive suite of financial tools to your users and future-proof your business with Stripe Treasury.

title: Stripe - Services Overview
content:
## Stripe: Powering Global Commerce with Integrated Payments Infrastructure

Stripe provides a comprehensive suite of payment processing and financial infrastructure solutions, designed to empower businesses of all sizes to thrive in the digital economy. We streamline online commerce, providing secure, scalable, and developer-friendly tools that integrate seamlessly into your existing operations.

**Core Service Offerings:**

*   **Payment Acceptance:** Accept payments globally via credit cards, debit cards, wallets (Apple Pay, Google Pay), and local payment methods with Stripe Payments. We support over 135 currencies and offer advanced fraud protection powered by Stripe Radar, minimizing risks and maximizing conversions. Flexible APIs and pre-built UI components (Stripe Elements) allow for customized checkout experiences.
*   **Stripe Connect:** Build your own marketplace or platform with Stripe Connect, enabling you to onboard sellers, manage payouts, and facilitate secure transactions. Connect handles complexities like KYC/KYB compliance, tax reporting, and multi-party payments, allowing you to focus on core platform development.
*   **Stripe Billing:** Automate recurring revenue management with Stripe Billing. Create subscription plans, manage invoices, track revenue, and handle failed payments intelligently. Stripe Billing supports complex pricing models, usage-based billing, and automated tax calculations, optimizing your subscription business.
*   **Stripe Treasury:** Embed financial services directly into your platform with Stripe Treasury. Offer users FDIC-insured accounts, instant payouts, and access to capital, all powered by Stripe's robust infrastructure. This empowers you to create a richer user experience and drive platform stickiness.

**Target Market & Client Types:**

Stripe serves a diverse range of businesses, including:

*   E-commerce businesses (from startups to enterprises)
*   Software-as-a-Service (SaaS) companies
*   Marketplaces and platforms
*   Subscription-based services
*   Non-profit organizations

**Service Delivery:**

Stripe's solutions are primarily delivered through APIs, SDKs, and a user-friendly dashboard. Our documentation is comprehensive, and our support team offers expert assistance to ensure seamless integration and ongoing success. We prioritize security and compliance, adhering to PCI DSS Level 1 certification and offering features to support GDPR and other regulatory requirements.

**Success Metrics & Partnerships:**

Stripe's platform is built for scale and reliability. We track key performance indicators such as uptime, transaction success rates, and fraud prevention effectiveness. Stripe partners with leading technology platforms and financial institutions to provide a seamless and integrated experience for our customers.

## Streamlining Your Growth: Beyond Payment Processing with Stripe Services

Stripe is more than just payments. We provide comprehensive services designed to empower businesses of all sizes, from startups to enterprises, to optimize their online operations and accelerate growth. While our core offering revolutionizes online payment acceptance, our expanded suite of services provides the crucial support and expertise needed to navigate the complexities of today’s digital landscape.

**Advanced Data & Analytics Consulting:** Leverage the power of your Stripe data with our personalized analytics consulting. Our expert data scientists will help you unlock valuable insights from your transaction data to improve customer conversion rates, identify fraud patterns, and optimize pricing strategies. We provide tailored dashboards and reports, data integration assistance, and custom analytics solutions built specifically for your business needs.

**Stripe Tax Implementation & Optimization:** Simplify tax compliance across jurisdictions with our specialized Stripe Tax implementation services. Our team guides you through configuring Stripe Tax to accurately calculate and collect sales tax, VAT, and GST, minimizing compliance risks and maximizing efficiency. We offer customized setup assistance, ongoing support for changing tax regulations, and integration with leading accounting software.

**Managed Security Services:** Protect your business and your customers with our dedicated Managed Security Services. We proactively monitor your Stripe integration for suspicious activity, conduct regular security audits, and provide incident response support to mitigate potential threats. Our services include vulnerability scanning, penetration testing, and compliance assistance with industry standards like PCI DSS.

**Migration & Integration Support:** Ensure a seamless transition to Stripe with our expert migration and integration support. Our team provides hands-on assistance with migrating your existing payment data, integrating Stripe with your CRM, ERP, or e-commerce platform, and customizing your payment flow for optimal performance.

**Target Market:** This service portfolio serves businesses experiencing growing pains with payment processing, those struggling with data insights, compliance and security, and/or those needing more hands-on assistance with maximizing their Stripe integration.

We leverage a data-driven approach, using Stripe's internal analytics and your specific business needs to tailor our solutions. Our success is measured by tangible improvements in your key performance indicators, including increased revenue, reduced fraud rates, and streamlined operational efficiency. Partner with Stripe Services and unlock the full potential of your online business.

title: Stripe - Q2 2025 Financial Report
content:
**Stripe, Inc. - Q2 2025 Financial Report**

**Executive Summary**

Stripe delivered a solid performance in Q2 2025, demonstrating continued strength in our core payment processing business and notable traction with our newer product lines. We achieved revenue of $8.9 billion, representing a 17% year-over-year increase. While growth has moderated from the hyper-growth phase of recent years, this reflects the increasing scale of our operations and the evolving macroeconomic environment. Profitability continues to be a key focus, and we are pleased to report an adjusted EBITDA margin of 14.5% for the quarter.

**Revenue and Growth Metrics**

Our $8.9 billion in revenue was driven primarily by increased transaction volume across our platform. Stripe Payments remained the largest contributor, accounting for $7.8 billion of total revenue, reflecting a 15% YoY increase. Stripe Connect, our platform for marketplaces and SaaS businesses, exhibited strong growth, reaching $800 million in revenue, a 25% YoY increase, highlighting the increasing adoption of platform-based business models. Stripe Treasury, our banking-as-a-service offering, also showed promise, reaching $300 million in revenue and demonstrating the diversification of Stripe.

**Key Business Highlights and Achievements**

During Q2, we expanded our partnerships with several large enterprise clients, including Shopify and Amazon, further solidifying our position in the enterprise segment. We also launched localized payment methods in key European markets, driving increased transaction volume in the region. Furthermore, Stripe Identity experienced increased adoption, with verification volumes increasing by 40% YoY.

**Market Conditions and Competitive Landscape**

The payment processing sector remains highly competitive, with established players like PayPal and Adyen, as well as emerging fintech companies vying for market share. The macro-economic climate continues to pose challenges, with inflationary pressures and potential for recession influencing consumer spending and business investment. However, the increasing digitization of the global economy provides a strong underlying tailwind for the industry.

**Forward-Looking Statements and Guidance**

Looking ahead, we anticipate continued revenue growth in the range of 15-18% for the remainder of 2025. We will continue to invest strategically in product innovation, particularly in areas such as fraud prevention, embedded finance, and global expansion. We expect adjusted EBITDA margins to remain in the 13-15% range as we balance growth investments with profitability. We remain committed to providing innovative payment solutions and supporting the growth of our customers in a rapidly evolving digital landscape.

title: Stripe Wins Industry Award
content:
**FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE**

**Stripe Announces Strategic Partnership with Shopify to Enhance Global Ecommerce for Millions of Businesses**

SAN FRANCISCO, CA – October 26, 2023 – Stripe, a technology company building economic infrastructure for the internet, today announced a significant partnership with Shopify, a leading global commerce platform. This collaboration will integrate Stripe's advanced payment processing and fraud prevention capabilities directly into Shopify's platform, providing enhanced payment experiences and greater financial control for millions of businesses worldwide.

The partnership will focus on streamlining payment acceptance, reducing fraud risks, and improving overall conversion rates for Shopify merchants. Specifically, Stripe's Adaptive Acceptance product will be embedded within Shopify Payments, dynamically optimizing payment flows based on transaction characteristics and risk profiles. This will allow merchants to accept a wider range of payment methods, reduce failed transactions, and minimize exposure to fraudulent activities, all while maintaining a seamless checkout experience for their customers. Additionally, Shopify merchants will gain access to Stripe's robust reporting and analytics tools, providing deeper insights into their payment performance and helping them make data-driven decisions to optimize their revenue.

"We're thrilled to join forces with Shopify to empower businesses of all sizes with the tools they need to thrive in the global economy," said Dhivya Suryadevara, Chief Financial Officer at Stripe. "This partnership represents a significant step forward in our mission to build economic infrastructure for the internet. By seamlessly integrating Stripe's advanced technology into Shopify's platform, we're making it easier than ever for businesses to accept payments, manage risk, and scale their operations."

Stripe is a technology company that builds economic infrastructure for the internet. Businesses of every size—from new startups to public companies—use Stripe’s software to accept payments and manage their businesses online. Stripe helps power businesses all over the world and across nearly every industry.

Contact:
support@stripe.com

title: Enterprise True Solution - Product Brochure
content:
## Unleash Your Team's Potential with Jira Software

**Stop managing tasks. Start delivering results.**

In today's fast-paced software development world, seamless collaboration and efficient workflow management are paramount. Jira Software, by Atlassian, is the #1 software development tool used by agile teams to plan, track, and release world-class software.

**Features that Empower:**

*   **Agile Project Management:** Configure Scrum, Kanban, or create your own custom workflow to perfectly match your team's methodology. Easily create user stories, estimate effort with story points, and prioritize tasks with a simple drag-and-drop interface.
*   **Issue Tracking:** Capture bugs, feature requests, and tasks with unparalleled clarity. Define custom fields, workflows, and statuses to ensure every issue is accurately categorized and resolved.
*   **Reporting & Analytics:** Gain real-time insights into team performance with out-of-the-box reports like burn-down charts, velocity charts, and cumulative flow diagrams. Identify bottlenecks, track progress, and make data-driven decisions to optimize your development process.
*   **Automation:** Reduce manual tasks and streamline workflows with powerful automation rules. Automatically assign issues, send notifications, and transition statuses based on pre-defined triggers, freeing up your team to focus on what matters most: building great software.
*   **Integrations:** Seamlessly integrate with other Atlassian products like Confluence for documentation and Bitbucket for code management. Jira also integrates with hundreds of other popular development tools through the Atlassian Marketplace, creating a connected ecosystem for your entire team.

**Built for Teams of All Sizes:**

Jira Software is designed for software development teams of all sizes, from startups to enterprise organizations. Whether you're building a mobile app, a complex web platform, or a new cloud service, Jira provides the flexibility and scalability you need to succeed.

**Unleash Your Team's Potential:**

*   **Increased Productivity:** Streamline workflows and eliminate bottlenecks for faster, more efficient development cycles.
*   **Improved Collaboration:** Foster clear communication and collaboration across teams and departments.
*   **Enhanced Visibility:** Gain real-time insights into project status and team performance.
*   **Better Software:** Deliver higher-quality software that meets customer needs and exceeds expectations.

**Start your free trial of Jira Software today and experience the power of connected development.** Visit atlassian.com/jira/software to learn more.

## Atlassian Compass: Your North Star for Distributed Architecture

**Navigating the complexities of modern microservices and distributed architecture? Atlassian Compass provides a centralized, collaborative platform to tame the chaos and empower your engineering teams.**

Compass is more than just a service catalog. It’s a comprehensive developer experience platform designed to improve software health, reduce cognitive load, and foster ownership within your teams.

**Unlock unprecedented visibility and control:**

*   **Centralized Component Registry:** Automatically ingest component metadata from your CI/CD pipelines, code repositories, and cloud providers. Effortlessly track service owners, dependencies, and critical metrics in one unified view.
*   **Scorecards & Health Metrics:** Define custom scorecards tailored to your organization's specific needs. Automatically track crucial metrics like deployment frequency, code coverage, security vulnerabilities, and API response times, providing a clear picture of component health.
*   **Extensible Tool Ecosystem:** Integrate seamlessly with your existing development tools like Jira, Bitbucket, PagerDuty, and more. Trigger actions based on scorecard results, automate incident response, and streamline your workflows.
*   **Real-time Collaboration:** Enable effective communication and collaboration around components with built-in comment threads, activity feeds, and dedicated spaces for documentation and discussion.

**Who benefits from Compass?**

Compass is ideal for:

*   **Engineering Managers:** Gain a holistic view of system health, identify bottlenecks, and proactively address potential issues.
*   **Developers:** Reduce context switching, quickly find relevant information, and confidently deploy code with improved visibility into dependencies.
*   **SREs:** Automate incident response, improve service reliability, and proactively identify potential outages.

**Compass Advantage:**

Unlike fragmented monitoring tools, Compass offers a unified and collaborative experience, fostering a culture of shared ownership and proactive problem-solving. By connecting your existing tools and processes, Compass empowers your teams to build and maintain resilient, scalable, and high-performing distributed systems.

**Start your journey towards architectural clarity today. Visit Atlassian.com/Compass to learn more and request a demo.**

title: Atlassian - Services Overview
content:
## Unlock Your Team's Potential: Atlassian Professional Services

Atlassian empowers teams to collaborate, build, and innovate more effectively. Our Professional Services offerings are designed to accelerate your adoption, optimize your use, and maximize the value you derive from the Atlassian platform. We partner with you to achieve your business goals, leveraging our deep product expertise and proven methodologies.

**Core Service Offerings:**

*   **Implementation & Migration:** Seamlessly transition to the Atlassian platform. We provide expert guidance and hands-on support for migrating from existing systems, deploying Atlassian products (Jira Software, Confluence, Jira Service Management, Trello Enterprise, Bitbucket), and configuring them to align with your unique workflows and security requirements.
*   **Workflow & Process Optimization:** Enhance team performance with streamlined workflows. Our consultants analyze your existing processes and design optimized workflows within Atlassian tools, incorporating automation, integrations, and best practices to improve efficiency, reduce bottlenecks, and enhance collaboration.
*   **Custom Solutions & Integrations:** Extend the power of Atlassian with tailored solutions. We develop custom apps, integrations, and plugins to address specific business needs and connect Atlassian products with other critical systems, such as CRM, finance, or HR platforms.
*   **Training & Enablement:** Empower your teams to become Atlassian experts. We offer comprehensive training programs, workshops, and on-demand resources to ensure your users are proficient in utilizing Atlassian tools, maximizing their impact, and driving adoption across your organization.

**Target Market & Client Types:**

Our services are tailored for organizations of all sizes, ranging from small startups to large enterprises, across various industries including software development, IT, finance, healthcare, and education. We work with teams across different functions, including product management, engineering, operations, and support.

**Service Delivery & Methodology:**

We employ a collaborative, agile approach to service delivery, ensuring that our solutions are aligned with your specific needs and goals. Our methodology includes:

*   **Discovery & Assessment:** Thoroughly understanding your current state, challenges, and desired outcomes.
*   **Solution Design:** Crafting a tailored solution that addresses your specific requirements and aligns with Atlassian best practices.
*   **Implementation & Deployment:** Providing hands-on support for configuring, customizing, and deploying the solution.
*   **Training & Knowledge Transfer:** Equipping your team with the knowledge and skills to effectively manage and maintain the Atlassian platform.

**Success Metrics & Expertise:**

Our success is measured by your success. We track key metrics such as improved team collaboration, increased productivity, reduced cycle times, and enhanced customer satisfaction. Atlassian Professional Services consultants possess deep expertise in the Atlassian platform and hold relevant certifications such as Atlassian Certified Professionals, demonstrating our commitment to providing the highest quality services. We are a proud Atlassian Platinum Solution Partner.

Let Atlassian Professional Services help you unlock the full potential of your teams and transform the way you work.

Atlassian empowers teams to collaborate, build, and innovate more effectively. We partner with you to achieve your business goals, leveraging our deep product expertise and proven methodologies.

**Core Service Offerings:**

*   **Implementation & Migration:** Seamlessly transition to the Atlassian platform. We provide expert guidance and hands-on support for migrating from existing systems, deploying Atlassian products (Jira Software, Confluence, Jira Service Management, Trello Enterprise, Bitbucket), and configuring them to align with your unique workflows and security requirements.
*   **Workflow & Process Optimization:** Enhance team performance with streamlined workflows. Our consultants analyze your existing processes and design optimized workflows within Atlassian tools, incorporating automation, integrations, and best practices to improve efficiency, reduce bottlenecks, and enhance collaboration.
*   **Custom Solutions & Integrations:** Extend the power of Atlassian with tailored solutions. We develop custom apps, integrations, and plugins to address specific business needs and connect Atlassian products with other critical systems, such as CRM, finance, or HR platforms.
*   **Training & Enablement:** Empower your teams to become Atlassian experts. We offer comprehensive training programs, workshops, and on-demand resources to ensure your users are proficient in utilizing Atlassian tools, maximizing their impact, and driving adoption across your organization.

**Target Market & Client Types:**

Our services are tailored for organizations of all sizes, ranging from small startups to large enterprises, across various industries including software development, IT, finance, healthcare, and education. We work with teams across different functions, including product management, engineering, operations, and support.

We employ a collaborative, agile approach to service delivery, ensuring that our solutions are aligned with your specific needs and goals. Our methodology includes:

title: Atlassian - Q1 2024 Financial Report
content:
**Atlassian Corporation Plc – Q1 FY24 Financial Report**

**Executive Summary:**

Atlassian delivered a solid start to fiscal year 2024, demonstrating continued growth in a dynamic macroeconomic environment. Q1 revenue reached approximately $985 million, reflecting Atlassian's strong position in the software development tools market and the ongoing migration to cloud-based solutions. While growth has moderated compared to prior periods due to prevailing economic uncertainties, we maintained profitability and achieved significant milestones in product innovation and customer engagement. We remain committed to investing in our cloud platform and expanding our product offerings to serve the evolving needs of our customers.

**Revenue Performance:**

Total revenue for Q1 FY24 was $985 million, representing a year-over-year increase of approximately 24%. Subscription revenue, driven by strong growth in cloud subscriptions for Jira, Confluence, and Trello, reached $850 million, demonstrating a continued shift towards cloud-based solutions. Marketplace and other revenue streams accounted for the remaining $135 million. Geographically, North America continues to be our largest market, followed by Europe and Asia-Pacific, with notable growth observed in emerging markets.

**Key Business Highlights:**

During Q1, Atlassian made significant strides in enhancing its cloud platform, introducing new AI-powered features across its core product suite to improve user productivity and collaboration. We also focused on expanding our customer base, particularly among larger enterprises, by offering tailored solutions and enhanced support services. The acquisition of a small innovative DevOps tool company during the quarter further strengthens our competitive advantage in the DevOps space.

**Market Conditions and Competitive Landscape:**

The software development tools market remains highly competitive, with increasing demand for integrated, cloud-based solutions. Macroeconomic headwinds continue to impact customer spending decisions, lengthening sales cycles, particularly for larger deals. Atlassian faces competition from both established players and emerging startups. We are confident that our focus on product innovation, customer satisfaction, and strategic acquisitions will enable us to maintain our leadership position.

**Forward-Looking Statements and Guidance:**

For Q2 FY24, we anticipate revenue in the range of $1.01 billion to $1.03 billion. While we acknowledge the ongoing economic uncertainty, we are confident in our ability to execute our growth strategy. We remain committed to our long-term vision of empowering teams everywhere and continue to invest in the growth opportunities in front of us, particularly with generative AI integrated into our products. We will continue to monitor macroeconomic conditions and adjust our strategy as needed.

title: Atlassian Wins Industry Award
content:
**FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE**

**Atlassian Announces Enhanced Jira Service Management Integration with Slack to Streamline Incident Response**

SAN FRANCISCO, CA – October 26, 2023 – Atlassian Corporation (NASDAQ: TEAM), a leading provider of team collaboration and productivity software, today announced significant enhancements to its Jira Service Management integration with Slack, enabling faster incident response and improved communication for DevOps and IT teams. The new features provide seamless bi-directional synchronization between Jira Service Management incidents and Slack channels, allowing teams to resolve issues more efficiently.

The upgraded integration allows users to create Jira Service Management incidents directly from Slack, eliminating the need to switch between applications. Real-time updates on incident status, comments, and assignments are now automatically synchronized between the two platforms. This ensures that all team members, regardless of their preferred communication channel, have access to the most current information, fostering transparency and accountability during critical incident resolution. Further, the enhanced integration supports advanced alerting and notification rules, allowing teams to customize how and when they are notified of incidents based on severity and priority.

"In today's fast-paced digital landscape, every minute counts when resolving incidents," said Edwin Wong, Vice President of Product Management at Atlassian. "Our enhanced Jira Service Management integration with Slack streamlines workflows, breaks down communication silos, and empowers teams to resolve incidents faster and more effectively, ultimately improving the customer experience."

Atlassian unleashes the potential of every team. Our collaboration software equips teams with everything they need to organize, discuss, and complete shared work. Teams at more than 200,000 customers around the world, including 85 of the Fortune 100, use Atlassian’s project tracking, content creation and sharing, and service management products to work better together and deliver quality results on time. Learn more about our products, including Jira Software, Confluence, Trello, and Jira Service Management at https://www.atlassian.com.

Contact:
support@atlassian.com

title: Premium Front Suite - Product Brochure
content:
## Unlock Unified Insights with Snowflake's Data Cloud: Introducing Snowpark

**Break free from siloed data and unleash the power of true unified analytics with Snowpark, Snowflake's developer framework.** Snowpark brings enhanced programming language support and flexible processing infrastructure to your data within the security and governance perimeter of the Snowflake Data Cloud.

**Unlock Advanced Analytics with Familiar Languages:** Snowpark eliminates the complexity of moving data for advanced processing. Develop directly within Snowflake using familiar languages like Scala, Java, and Python. Leverage Snowpark’s seamless integration with popular development tools and libraries such as Spark, Pandas, and scikit-learn, enabling your data science and engineering teams to rapidly build sophisticated data pipelines and machine learning models.

**Unleash the Power of Snowflake's Engine:** Unlike traditional data processing architectures, Snowpark leverages Snowflake's massively parallel processing (MPP) engine. This allows you to execute complex analytical computations directly within the Data Cloud, benefiting from Snowflake's near-infinite scalability and performance. No more managing separate compute clusters – Snowpark automatically provisions and manages resources, optimizing for cost and performance.

**Target Customers and Use Cases:** Snowpark empowers data scientists, data engineers, and developers across diverse industries. Use cases include:

*   **Financial Services:** Build real-time fraud detection models directly on transactional data within Snowflake.
*   **Healthcare:** Develop personalized patient care models leveraging secure patient data within a governed environment.
*   **Retail:** Optimize supply chain management by analyzing sales trends and inventory data within Snowflake.

**Competitive Advantages:** Snowpark offers a distinct advantage over legacy data platforms and standalone data science tools. Its unified architecture eliminates data movement, reduces latency, and simplifies data governance. Key differentiators include:

*   **Zero Data Movement:** Process data where it lives, eliminating the cost and complexity of ETL.
*   **Scalability and Performance:** Leverage Snowflake's MPP engine for unparalleled performance and scalability.
*   **Enhanced Security and Governance:** Maintain the highest levels of data security and compliance within Snowflake’s trusted environment.

**Key Metric:** Achieve up to **10x faster data processing** compared to traditional data pipelines by eliminating data movement and leveraging Snowflake's powerful compute engine.

**Transform your data into actionable insights with Snowpark. Visit snowflake.com/snowpark to learn more and request a demo.**

content_pdf:
## Unleash the Power of Data Governance with Snowflake Governance Accelerated

**Elevate your data security, compliance, and control with Snowflake Governance Accelerated, a comprehensive suite of advanced features designed to unlock the full potential of your data in the Snowflake Data Cloud.**

In today's complex data landscape, ensuring data integrity and compliance is paramount. Snowflake Governance Accelerated provides a robust framework to manage and protect your sensitive data, enabling you to build trust and drive informed decision-making.

**Key Features & Capabilities:**

*   **Row-Level Security (RLS):** Granularly control data access at the row level based on user roles, attributes, or dynamic conditions. Enforce strict security policies without sacrificing performance.
*   **Object Tagging:** Assign custom tags to any Snowflake object (tables, columns, views, warehouses) for streamlined data discovery, classification, and policy enforcement. Automate data governance workflows using tag-based policies.
*   **Data Masking:** Protect sensitive information with dynamic data masking policies. Define masking rules based on data type, role, or condition to redact, substitute, or obfuscate data at query time, ensuring compliance with regulations like GDPR and CCPA.
*   **Access History:** Gain a complete audit trail of all data access activity, including queries, users, and objects accessed. Proactively identify and investigate potential security risks or compliance violations.

**Target Customers & Use Cases:**

Governance Accelerated is ideal for:

*   **Financial Services:** Meet strict regulatory requirements, protect customer data, and prevent fraud.
*   **Healthcare:** Ensure HIPAA compliance and safeguard patient privacy.
*   **Retail:** Secure customer loyalty data and protect against unauthorized access.
*   **Organizations across all industries** that need to meet compliance mandates.

**Competitive Advantages & Unique Value Proposition:**

Unlike traditional data governance solutions, Snowflake Governance Accelerated is seamlessly integrated within the Snowflake Data Cloud, providing a unified and efficient approach to data security and compliance. It eliminates the need for separate tools and reduces the complexity of managing data governance policies. Because Governance Accelerated is built within Snowflake's architecture, it ensures consistent policy enforcement across all data workloads with minimal impact on performance. Data privacy is guaranteed.

**Key Metric:** Achieve up to 80% reduction in time spent on data governance tasks with automated policies and centralized management.

title: Snowflake - Services Overview
content:
## Unleash the Power of Your Data with Snowflake Professional Services

In today's data-driven world, unlocking the true potential of your information is paramount. Snowflake Professional Services provides the expert guidance and support you need to maximize your investment in the Data Cloud. We empower organizations across all industries to leverage Snowflake's capabilities for transformative business outcomes.

**Core Service Offerings:**

*   **Snowflake Implementation & Migration:** Accelerate your journey to the Data Cloud with our proven implementation methodology. We offer end-to-end support, including needs assessment, architecture design, data migration strategy, ETL/ELT pipeline development, and comprehensive testing. Our experts ensure a seamless and secure transition from legacy systems or other cloud platforms.
*   **Data Architecture & Governance:** Design a robust and scalable data architecture tailored to your specific business requirements. Our consultants provide expertise in data modeling, schema design, data governance frameworks, and security best practices. We help you establish a single source of truth, ensuring data quality, compliance, and consistent insights.
*   **Performance Optimization & Tuning:** Maximize the efficiency and cost-effectiveness of your Snowflake environment. Our performance optimization services include query optimization, data clustering strategies, and warehouse sizing recommendations. We identify bottlenecks, improve query performance, and reduce operational costs.
*   **Advanced Analytics & Data Science Enablement:** Empower your data scientists and analysts with the tools and expertise they need to drive innovation. We offer guidance on building advanced analytics solutions using Snowflake's native capabilities and integrating with popular data science platforms. We help you unlock predictive insights, personalize customer experiences, and drive data-informed decision-making.

**Target Market & Clients:**

Our services cater to organizations of all sizes and across industries, including Financial Services, Healthcare, Retail, and Technology. We support clients ranging from startups to large enterprises seeking to modernize their data infrastructure, improve data governance, and unlock new business opportunities.

**Service Delivery Approach:**

We employ a collaborative and agile methodology, working closely with your team to understand your unique challenges and objectives. Our certified Snowflake consultants leverage proven frameworks and best practices to deliver tailored solutions that meet your specific needs.

**Snowflake Expertise & Partnerships:**

Snowflake Professional Services is deeply integrated with the Snowflake ecosystem. We hold advanced certifications in Snowflake architecture and implementation. This allows us to provide cutting-edge solutions and leverage the latest features and capabilities of the Data Cloud. Our strong relationships with leading technology partners further enhance our ability to deliver comprehensive and innovative solutions.

## Unlock the Full Potential of Your Data Cloud: Beyond Core Implementation with Snowflake

While Snowflake empowers organizations with unparalleled data warehousing and analytics capabilities, truly maximizing your investment requires a holistic approach. Snowflake Professional Services extends beyond core implementation, providing specialized expertise to optimize your data journey at every stage.

**Elevating Your Data Strategy & Governance:**

Our **Data Strategy & Governance Services** are designed to help you unlock the true value of your data. We go beyond initial data migration to define robust data governance frameworks tailored to your specific business needs. This includes:

*   **Data Catalog Implementation:** Utilizing advanced metadata management and discovery tools to create a comprehensive and searchable data catalog, ensuring data lineage, quality, and compliance.
*   **Data Quality Assessment & Remediation:** Identifying and addressing data quality issues across your data landscape, implementing automated validation rules and cleansing processes to ensure data accuracy and reliability.
*   **Compliance Enablement:** Assisting with compliance requirements (e.g., GDPR, CCPA) by designing and implementing data privacy and security controls, including data masking and anonymization techniques.

**Optimizing Performance & Cost:**

Snowflake's **Performance Optimization & Cost Management Services** ensure you're maximizing performance while minimizing operational expenses. This involves:

*   **Workload Optimization:** Analyzing query patterns and resource utilization to identify bottlenecks and optimize workload distribution, resulting in faster query response times and improved system efficiency.
*   **Cost Governance & Monitoring:** Implementing proactive cost management strategies, including resource tagging, cost dashboards, and automated alerts, to gain visibility into cloud consumption and prevent unnecessary spending.
*   **Advanced Security Configuration:** Reinforcing your security posture with enhanced network policies, object-level access control, and continuous security monitoring, protecting your sensitive data from unauthorized access.

**Target Market:** Large enterprises and mid-sized businesses across all industries leveraging Snowflake for data warehousing, business intelligence, and advanced analytics.

**Service Delivery:** Our experienced consultants work collaboratively with your team using agile methodologies, combining on-site workshops with remote expertise, to deliver tailored solutions that meet your specific needs.

**Success Metrics:** Reduced query runtimes, improved data quality scores, demonstrable cost savings through optimized resource utilization, and enhanced security posture as measured by compliance audits. Snowflake Professional Services operates under a rigorous framework, and our consultants hold relevant industry certifications (e.g., CDMP, CISSP) and leverage proven Snowflake best practices to guarantee impactful results. We are a trusted partner committed to your long-term success in the Data Cloud.

title: Snowflake - Q1 2022 Financial Report
content:
**Snowflake Inc. – Q1 2022 Financial Report**

**Executive Summary:**

Snowflake delivered a strong first quarter of fiscal year 2022, demonstrating continued momentum in the Data Cloud. Revenue growth remains robust, fueled by increasing customer adoption and deeper penetration within existing accounts. While macroeconomic headwinds are present, Snowflake’s value proposition as a mission-critical data platform continues to resonate. We achieved significant milestones in product innovation and market expansion during the quarter, setting the stage for sustained growth in the coming periods.

**Financial Performance:**

Total revenue for Q1 2022 reached $422.4 million, representing a year-over-year increase of 84%. Product revenue, the core driver of our business, grew to $402 million, up 83% year-over-year. Remaining performance obligations (RPO) grew substantially year-over-year, reflecting continued strong demand. Adjusted gross margin remained strong at 70%. While operating losses persist as we invest in growth, we are committed to driving leverage over time.

**Key Business Highlights:**

During Q1, we saw continued adoption of our platform across various industries, notably in financial services and healthcare, with customers leveraging Snowflake for data warehousing, data lakes, data engineering, data science, and secure data sharing. Key product advancements included enhanced support for unstructured data and improvements to our Snowpark developer framework, further broadening our addressable market. We also expanded our presence in the EMEA region, witnessing notable growth in customer acquisition and consumption.

**Market Conditions and Competitive Landscape:**

The Data Cloud market remains highly competitive, with established cloud providers and emerging specialized vendors vying for market share. We believe Snowflake's unique architecture, focus on ease of use, and robust security features provide a differentiated advantage. Despite inflationary pressures and potential economic slowdowns, organizations continue to prioritize data-driven decision-making, supporting ongoing demand for our platform.

**Forward-Looking Statements and Guidance:**

For Q2 2022, we expect product revenue to be in the range of $435 million to $440 million, representing year-over-year growth of approximately 70%. We maintain our fiscal year 2022 product revenue guidance of $1.90 billion to $1.915 billion, reflecting our confidence in the long-term potential of the Data Cloud. While we acknowledge potential near-term macroeconomic uncertainties, we remain focused on executing our strategic priorities, driving customer success, and delivering sustainable, profitable growth. We will continue to monitor the macroeconomic environment and adjust our strategy as needed.

title: Snowflake Launches Revolutionary New Product
content:
**FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE**

**Snowflake Announces General Availability of Snowpark Container Services, Revolutionizing Data Application Development**

SAN MATEO, CA – October 26, 2023 – Snowflake (NYSE: SNOW), the Data Cloud company, today announced the general availability of Snowpark Container Services, a fully managed container service directly within Snowflake. This launch empowers developers to build, deploy, and manage sophisticated data applications leveraging familiar container technologies, all while benefiting from Snowflake's security, governance, and scalability.

Snowpark Container Services significantly simplifies the process of building and deploying complex applications like LLMs, data science models, and AI-powered workflows directly alongside data within the Data Cloud. Unlike traditional methods which require extensive data movement and integration, this new service allows developers to work directly with governed data and utilize a wide range of open-source tools and container images. Key benefits include reduced latency, improved data security, streamlined deployment pipelines, and faster time-to-market for data-driven applications. This allows customers to build applications that previously required external infrastructure directly within Snowflake, furthering the company's vision of a single, unified platform for all data workloads.

"Snowpark Container Services represents a major leap forward in data application development," said Chris Degnan, Chief Revenue Officer at Snowflake. "By bringing containerized workloads directly to the data, we're removing the barriers that previously slowed down innovation and allowing our customers to unlock even greater value from their data in a secure and governed environment. We are seeing a huge appetite from customers wanting to build these applications directly within Snowflake, leveraging the power and scalability they already know and trust."

Snowflake’s Data Cloud helps organizations unlock the power of their data by connecting them to the most relevant and readily available data, applications, and data services. Customers use Snowflake to unite siloed data, discover and securely share data, and execute diverse analytic workloads. Wherever data or users live, Snowflake delivers a single data experience that spans multiple clouds and geographies. Thousands of customers across many industries, including 643 of the 2023 Forbes Global 2000 (G2K) companies, use Snowflake Data Cloud to power their businesses. Learn more at snowflake.com.

Contact:
support@snowflake.com

title: Premium Ever Suite - Product Brochure
content:
## Unlock Unified Data Intelligence with Snowflake's Data Cloud

**Transform your data into actionable insights with Snowflake, the Data Cloud built for today's demands.**

Is your data trapped in silos, making it difficult to gain a holistic view of your business? Do you struggle to scale your analytics infrastructure as your data volumes grow? Snowflake’s Data Cloud provides a single, unified platform to address these challenges and unlock the true potential of your data.

**Snowflake's Data Cloud enables:**

*   **Data Warehousing:** Experience unmatched performance and concurrency with Snowflake's multi-cluster shared data architecture. Independently scale compute and storage to handle even the most demanding workloads. Benefit from features like zero-copy cloning for rapid development and testing, and time travel for historical data analysis.

*   **Data Lake:** Load and analyze structured, semi-structured, and unstructured data directly in Snowflake, eliminating the complexity and cost of separate data lakes. Support for formats like JSON, Avro, Parquet, and ORC allows you to analyze any data without transformation, using familiar SQL syntax.

*   **Data Engineering:** Build robust data pipelines with Snowflake's robust integration with popular ETL/ELT tools. Leverage features like Snowpipe for continuous data ingestion and streams/tasks for complex data transformations within the Data Cloud.

*   **Secure Data Sharing:** Seamlessly and securely share live, governed data with partners, customers, and vendors without moving or copying data. Snowflake Data Marketplace provides access to third-party data sets, enriching your analytics and accelerating insights.

**Who benefits from Snowflake?**

*   **Retail:** Optimize inventory management, personalize customer experiences, and improve supply chain efficiency.
*   **Financial Services:** Detect fraud, manage risk, and comply with regulatory requirements.
*   **Healthcare:** Improve patient outcomes, optimize clinical operations, and accelerate research.
*   **Technology:** Analyze product usage, improve user engagement, and optimize marketing campaigns.

**Snowflake Advantage:**

*   **Fully Managed:** Eliminate operational overhead with Snowflake’s fully managed service, freeing your team to focus on delivering value.
*   **Elastic Performance:** Scale compute and storage independently to meet the demands of any workload.
*   **Secure & Compliant:** Industry-leading security features and comprehensive compliance certifications.
*   **Pay-as-you-go Pricing:** Only pay for the resources you use.

**Key Metrics:**

*   **Scalability:** Process petabytes of data with ease.
*   **Concurrency:** Support thousands of concurrent users.
*   **Uptime:** 99.99% uptime SLA.

**Ready to unlock the power of your data? Contact us today for a demo and discover how Snowflake can transform your business.**

title: Stage Make System - Product Brochure
content:
## Datadog Log Management: Unleash the Power of Your Data

**Stop sifting through endless log files and start proactively managing your system health with Datadog Log Management.** Designed for modern, complex environments, Datadog Log Management centralizes, processes, and analyzes your logs, transforming raw data into actionable insights.

**Key Features and Capabilities:**

*   **Unified Platform:** Seamlessly integrated with Datadog's infrastructure monitoring, APM, and security solutions, providing a holistic view of your environment. Correlate log events with metrics, traces, and security signals to pinpoint root causes faster.
*   **Powerful Parsing and Processing:** Automatically parse logs from any source, including application logs, system logs, and cloud platform logs. Utilize processors to enrich, redact, and filter log data in real-time, optimizing storage and analysis.
*   **Advanced Search and Analytics:** Leverage a powerful query language to search, filter, and aggregate log data. Create custom dashboards and visualizations to track key performance indicators and identify trends.
*   **Live Tail and Live Debugging:** Observe real-time log streams to quickly diagnose issues and accelerate debugging workflows. Directly tail logs from individual pods or containers for granular insights.
*   **Out-of-the-Box Integrations:** Get started quickly with pre-built integrations for popular technologies and platforms, including AWS, Azure, Kubernetes, and more.

**Target Customers and Use Cases:**

Datadog Log Management is ideal for developers, DevOps engineers, SREs, and security teams who need to:

*   Troubleshoot application performance issues
*   Monitor system health and identify anomalies
*   Investigate security incidents
*   Ensure compliance with regulatory requirements

**Competitive Advantages and Unique Value Proposition:**

Unlike traditional log management solutions, Datadog offers:

*   **Full-Stack Observability:** Log Management is natively integrated into Datadog's observability platform, providing unparalleled context and correlation.
*   **Cost-Effective Scalability:** Flexible pricing options and efficient data processing ensure cost-effective scalability to meet your evolving needs.
*   **AI-Powered Insights:** Leverage machine learning to automatically detect anomalies, identify patterns, and prioritize critical issues.

**Key Metrics:**

*   **Index and ingest billions of log events per day.**
*   **Achieve sub-second search latency for rapid troubleshooting.**
*   **Reduce MTTR with correlated metrics, traces, and logs.**

**Start transforming your log data into actionable insights today. Visit datadoghq.com to learn more and request a free trial.**

## Datadog Cloud SIEM: Protect Your Modern Attack Surface

**Gain unparalleled visibility and threat detection across your entire environment with Datadog Cloud SIEM.**

In today's complex, distributed environments, traditional SIEM solutions struggle to keep pace. Datadog Cloud SIEM delivers a modern, cloud-native approach to security information and event management, providing real-time threat detection, investigation, and response capabilities without the operational overhead.

**Key Features & Capabilities:**

*   **Unified Security Observability:** Consolidate logs, metrics, traces, security events, and cloud provider activity into a single, unified platform for comprehensive security insights. Built-in integrations with AWS, Azure, GCP, and common security tools like CrowdStrike and Palo Alto Networks accelerate onboarding and provide immediate value.
*   **Out-of-the-Box Detection Rules:** Leverage a rich library of pre-built detection rules, continuously updated by Datadog's security research team, to identify suspicious activity like lateral movement, credential stuffing, and data exfiltration. Customize rules with a powerful, intuitive query language (DDL) to tailor detection to your specific environment.
*   **Real-Time Correlation & Analysis:** Correlate events across your infrastructure in real-time to identify complex attack patterns and prioritize critical incidents. Datadog's AI-powered anomaly detection automatically flags unusual behavior, reducing alert fatigue and enabling faster response times.
*   **Interactive Investigation Workflows:** Streamline incident investigation with intuitive dashboards, timelines, and visualisations that provide context and accelerate root cause analysis. Collaboration features allow security teams to work together seamlessly, improving efficiency and reducing time to resolution.
*   **Compliance & Reporting:** Simplify compliance with built-in reports for industry standards like PCI DSS, SOC 2, and HIPAA. Automatically generate audit logs and demonstrate security posture to stakeholders.

**Target Customers & Use Cases:**

Datadog Cloud SIEM is ideal for security teams, security engineers, and SOC analysts in mid-sized to enterprise organizations who need a scalable, cloud-native solution for threat detection, investigation, and compliance. Use cases include:

*   Detecting and responding to security incidents in real-time
*   Automating security investigations and reducing alert fatigue
*   Improving security posture and compliance
*   Gaining visibility into cloud infrastructure security

**Competitive Advantage:**

Unlike traditional SIEMs, Datadog Cloud SIEM leverages the power of a unified observability platform. This provides unparalleled context and visibility, enabling faster and more accurate threat detection. Its cloud-native architecture ensures scalability, reliability, and ease of deployment, while its intuitive interface and powerful detection rules make it easy to use and manage. Key metric: Milliseconds to ingest, process and correlate events from any source, at any scale.

**Datadog Cloud SIEM empowers you to protect your most critical assets and stay ahead of evolving threats.**

title: Datadog - Services Overview
content:
## Datadog Professional Services: Unlock the Full Potential of Observability

**Optimize Performance, Accelerate Innovation, and Drive Business Outcomes**

Datadog’s Professional Services team empowers organizations to maximize the value of their Datadog investment. We provide expert guidance and hands-on support to accelerate deployment, optimize configurations, and ensure continuous improvement of your monitoring and analytics capabilities. We partner with developers, IT operations, security teams, and business users across a diverse range of industries, including finance, healthcare, retail, and technology.

**Our Core Service Offerings:**

*   **Implementation & Onboarding:** Streamline your Datadog deployment with our tailored onboarding packages. We assist with agent installation, infrastructure integration (AWS, Azure, GCP, Kubernetes), and configuration of core dashboards and monitors. We ensure a seamless transition and rapid time-to-value, customized to your environment and observability goals.

*   **Custom Dashboard & Alerting Solutions:** Leverage our expertise to design and build advanced dashboards and customized alerting strategies tailored to your specific application and infrastructure needs. We create actionable insights to proactively identify performance bottlenecks, security vulnerabilities, and business-impacting incidents. Our solutions incorporate advanced features like anomaly detection and forecasting.

*   **Optimization & Performance Tuning:** Enhance your existing Datadog configurations to optimize performance and reduce operational overhead. We analyze your data flow, identify configuration inefficiencies, and implement best practices for resource utilization, data retention, and alerting rules. We also offer workload migration services to optimize cost and efficiency.

*   **Workshops & Training:** Empower your teams with in-depth knowledge of Datadog through customized workshops and training sessions. We provide hands-on training on key Datadog features, including APM, logging, security monitoring, and synthetic testing. Our training programs equip your teams with the skills to proactively manage your environment and leverage Datadog’s full capabilities.

**Service Delivery Approach:**

Our experienced consultants leverage a collaborative, agile approach, working closely with your teams to understand your unique challenges and objectives. We utilize proven methodologies and best practices to deliver solutions that are aligned with your business goals.

**Our Commitment to Success:**

Datadog Professional Services aims to demonstrably improve your key observability metrics, including:

*   **Reduced Mean Time to Resolution (MTTR):** Proactive alerting and optimized dashboards enable faster incident identification and resolution.
*   **Improved Application Performance:** Identify and address performance bottlenecks to enhance user experience and business outcomes.
*   **Enhanced Security Posture:** Comprehensive security monitoring and alerting capabilities to detect and respond to threats effectively.
*   **Increased Operational Efficiency:** Streamlined workflows and optimized configurations to reduce operational overhead.

Datadog is a certified AWS Partner, Azure Partner, and Google Cloud Partner, ensuring seamless integration with your cloud infrastructure. We are committed to delivering exceptional value and helping our clients achieve success through the power of observability.

Datadog is more than just a monitoring platform; it's a strategic partner for optimizing your entire technology stack. While known for industry-leading observability, Datadog Professional Services offer comprehensive solutions to accelerate your adoption, optimize your environment, and maximize the value derived from our platform.

**Empowering Your Team Through Specialized Training:** Go beyond basic platform navigation with Datadog's **Advanced Enablement Programs**. These customized workshops, delivered by Datadog Certified Experts, are tailored to your specific infrastructure and team skill levels. We offer specialized tracks focusing on areas like:

*   **Security Monitoring Mastery:** Enhance your security posture with in-depth training on utilizing Datadog Security Monitoring for threat detection, incident response, and compliance. Target audience: Security Engineers, SOC Analysts.
*   **Log Management Optimization:** Learn best practices for centralized log aggregation, parsing, and analysis to gain actionable insights from your log data. Tailored for DevOps engineers seeking improved troubleshooting capabilities.

**Strategic Implementation & Optimization Services:** Realize immediate ROI with our targeted services.

*   **Custom Dashboard & Alerting Design:** Our experts collaborate with your team to design visually compelling dashboards and intelligent alerts that surface critical issues before they impact your business. We ensure configurations align with your unique business needs and KPIs.
*   **Integrations Enablement:** Datadog seamlessly integrates with hundreds of technologies. Our services help you effectively integrate Datadog with your existing tools and services, such as AWS, Azure, GCP, and Kubernetes, ensuring comprehensive data capture and streamlined workflows.

**Service Delivery:** We leverage a consultative approach, working closely with your team to understand your specific requirements and develop a tailored solution. Our experts utilize proven methodologies and best practices gained from hundreds of successful Datadog implementations.

**Success Measured:** Datadog Professional Services track key metrics to demonstrate value, including reduced MTTR, improved application performance, enhanced security posture, and increased operational efficiency. Our commitment to your success is reflected in our high customer satisfaction ratings and long-term partnerships.

title: Datadog - Q3 2024 Financial Report
content:
**Datadog, Inc. – Q3 2024 Financial Results**

**Executive Summary:**

Datadog delivered a strong Q3 2024, demonstrating continued growth and profitability in the dynamic monitoring and analytics market. Revenue exceeded expectations, driven by robust customer acquisition and expansion within our existing customer base. We maintained a disciplined approach to operational efficiency, allowing us to achieve healthy operating margins while continuing to invest in strategic growth initiatives. Our focus on providing a unified observability platform continues to resonate with customers seeking to manage increasingly complex IT environments.

**Revenue Performance:**

Total revenue for Q3 2024 was $624 million, representing a 25% year-over-year increase. This growth was fueled by strength across all product lines, particularly in application performance monitoring (APM) and cloud security. Customers with annual recurring revenue (ARR) of $100,000 or more grew to over 3,300, showcasing our success in attracting and retaining large enterprise clients. International revenue accounted for approximately 30% of total revenue, indicating continued expansion in key markets like EMEA and APAC.

**Key Business Highlights:**

During Q3, Datadog continued to innovate and expand our product offerings. We launched new AI-powered features designed to proactively identify and resolve performance bottlenecks, further reducing mean time to resolution (MTTR) for our customers. We also achieved FedRAMP High authorization for our platform, unlocking significant opportunities in the U.S. public sector. Furthermore, we expanded our partnerships with leading cloud providers, enhancing integration capabilities and expanding our reach within their respective ecosystems.

**Market Conditions and Competitive Landscape:**

The monitoring and analytics market remains highly competitive, with continued innovation from both established players and emerging startups. Organizations are increasingly adopting cloud-native architectures and microservices, driving demand for comprehensive observability solutions. We are confident that Datadog's unified platform, strong customer relationships, and relentless focus on innovation will allow us to maintain our leadership position in this market.

**Forward-Looking Statements and Guidance:**

Based on our strong Q3 performance and current market trends, we are raising our full-year 2024 revenue guidance to $2.47 billion to $2.48 billion. We remain committed to delivering sustainable, profitable growth and believe Datadog is well-positioned to capitalize on the long-term opportunities in the observability market. We anticipate continued investments in R&D and sales & marketing to drive future growth and strengthen our competitive advantage.

title: Datadog Announces Strategic Partnership
content:
**FOR IMMEDIATE RELEASE**

**Datadog Announces Enhanced Serverless Monitoring Capabilities, Extending Observability into AWS Lambda@Edge**

NEW YORK, NY – October 26, 2023 – Datadog, Inc. (NASDAQ: DDOG), the monitoring and analytics platform for developers, IT operations, and business users, today announced expanded serverless monitoring capabilities, including comprehensive support for AWS Lambda@Edge. This enhancement provides deep visibility into edge compute functions, empowering organizations to optimize performance, troubleshoot issues faster, and deliver superior user experiences at the edge.

As organizations increasingly rely on serverless technologies for edge computing applications like content delivery and security processing, the need for comprehensive monitoring has become critical. Datadog's new Lambda@Edge support allows users to seamlessly correlate edge performance data with backend services, providing a unified view of their entire application architecture. This includes metrics, traces, logs, and profiling data, enabling teams to proactively identify and resolve latency issues, error spikes, and other performance bottlenecks.

This expanded serverless monitoring capability builds upon Datadog's existing robust support for AWS Lambda and other serverless platforms. By extending its observability footprint to the edge, Datadog helps organizations unlock the full potential of serverless technology, enabling them to build and deploy highly performant and scalable applications.

"Our customers are increasingly leveraging Lambda@Edge to deliver lightning-fast, personalized experiences to their users around the globe," said Renaud Benazet, VP of Product Management at Datadog. "With Datadog's enhanced serverless monitoring, they now have the granular visibility they need to ensure optimal performance and quickly address any issues that may arise at the edge."

**About Datadog**
Datadog is the monitoring and analytics platform for developers, IT operations teams, security engineers, and business users in the cloud age. Datadog’s SaaS platform integrates and automates infrastructure monitoring, application performance monitoring, log management, and security monitoring to provide unified, real-time observability of our customers’ entire technology stack. Datadog is used by organizations of all sizes and across a wide range of industries to enable digital transformation and cloud migration, drive collaboration among development, operations, security, and business teams, accelerate time to market for applications, reduce time to problem resolution, secure applications and infrastructure, understand user behavior, and track key business metrics.

**Contact:**
support@datadoghq.com
